name: js-multi-seed
description: Multi page hybrid application. While supporting new features such as react and ES6, it is compatible with the use of traditional web technologies such as jQuery.

scripts.local: npm run devWebpack && cross-env API=local webpack-dev-server
scripts.dev: npm run devWebpack && cross-env API=dev webpack-dev-server
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.production.config.js && npm run version
scripts.analyzer: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.production.config.js --profile --json > stats.json && webpack-bundle-analyzer stats.json
scripts.gemCompass: gem sources -a https://ruby.taobao.org/ --remove https://rubygems.org/ && gem install compass -v 1.0.3

author: alex86gbk
